about_the_game:
Double Jump is a classic style easy to pick up 2d platformer experience for you and a friend. Test the strength of your bond by playing together in this challenging world where if one of you makes a mistake, it could mean losing lots of progress!
Don't worry though, if the strength of your bond is perfectly synergistic, this game is easy as pie!
And remember if ever you make a mistake, it wasn't you, it was that pesky doofus you're playing with.

BEFORE YOU BUY: THIS GAME WAS DESIGNED WITH TWO PLAYERS IN MIND. YOU ABSOLUTELY CAN PLAY SINGLE PLAYER BUT THE GAME WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY EASIER, AS MOST OF THE CHALLENGE COMES FROM STAYING IN SYNC WITH THE OTHER PLAYER.
detailed_description:
Double Jump is a classic style easy to pick up 2d platformer experience for you and a friend. Test the strength of your bond by playing together in this challenging world where if one of you makes a mistake, it could mean losing lots of progress!
Don't worry though, if the strength of your bond is perfectly synergistic, this game is easy as pie!
And remember if ever you make a mistake, it wasn't you, it was that pesky doofus you're playing with.

BEFORE YOU BUY: THIS GAME WAS DESIGNED WITH TWO PLAYERS IN MIND. YOU ABSOLUTELY CAN PLAY SINGLE PLAYER BUT THE GAME WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY EASIER, AS MOST OF THE CHALLENGE COMES FROM STAYING IN SYNC WITH THE OTHER PLAYER.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Trust me bro whatever you got is fine for this game
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics cards are a myth made to sell more copies of cyberpunk
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
  • Additional Notes: IF THIS DOESN'T RUN ON YOUR MAC PLEASE REFUND IT AND MAKE A POST ON and I will fix it. I do not have a mac to test it on so my deepest apologies.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: What you have is fine, trust me
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: This game does have graphics, yes
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
  • Additional Notes: Oh your keyboard might have trouble. Depends on the keyboard

name: Double Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Up
  • Processor: What you have is fine
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: It's a 2d platformer with no particle effects. Go Wild.
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
  • Additional Notes: For real this should run on anything
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Up
  • Processor: It just is, okay?
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: This badboy should run on a dreamcast
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
  • Additional Notes: Weirdly the bottleneck will probably be your keyboard

short_description: Control a single character with a friend or partner, seeing how in sync you can get your motions. Being in phase will be rewarded, while being clumsy will be punished. I'm sure you have nothing to worry about though if you're always on the same page!
